message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I have to make a living too. I can do $140, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $140 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $135, but that's my final offer
I'm getting close to accepting, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to meet me at $130?
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $130, but I can meet you in the middle of $130 and $135. How about $132.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to meet me at $130?
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $130, but I can try to meet you a bit closer to that price. How about $131.25?
I'm getting close to accepting, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to meet me at $131?
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $131, but I can try to meet you a bit closer to that price. How about $131.50?
